title: John Fortier, "After the People Vote: A Guide to the Electoral College"
description:
The American Enterprise Institute’s John Fortier provides his guide to understanding the electoral college process. He’s interviewed by author & former editor-in-chief of the Texas Review of Law & Politics Tara Ross.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
